The megalithic structure shown uses a similar building technique to that of Stonehenge, in that the stones are

choices.label: aligned with the Sun along a strict north-south axis
securely fitted together using mortise-and-tenon joints
arranged with upright vertical elements supporting a horizontal element
cantilevered with projecting elements anchored on one side

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
